abstract: The audio processing tap associated with the track.
overview:
## Discussion

You can use the audio tap to access the track’s audio data before it is played, read, or exported. This property is `nil` by default.

The process of setting up a tap requires the configuration of an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters]. If an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters] is present in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioMix/inputParameters] array of an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioMix], the results of mutating the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters] while the audio mix is in use are undefined

# audioTapProcessor

**Instance Property**

The audio processing tap associated with the track.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioTapProcessor: MTAudioProcessingTap? { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use the audio tap to access the track’s audio data before it is played, read, or exported. This property is `nil` by default.

The process of setting up a tap requires the configuration of an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters]. If an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters] is present in the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioMix/inputParameters] array of an [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAudioMix], the results of mutating the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMutableAudioMixInputParameters] while the audio mix is in use are undefined
title: audioTapProcessor
